  • Constructor Details

    • RockBlockStatus

      public RockBlockStatus(String comPort, boolean commReady, String portError, int signalStrength, int numOutgoingMess, int numIncomingMess)
      Parameters:
      comPort - Com Port we're trying to use
      commReady - boolean indicating whether or not we are communicating with RockBlock
      portError - error code, if any
      signalStrength - int 0-5
      numOutgoingMess - number of messages in the outgoing queue
      numIncomingMess - number of incoming messages waiting to be received
